feed.title: Chiyogami Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Chiyogami: v1.3.3
entry.content:
• Minor accessibility improvements
  • Added password visibility toggles
  • Updated paste encryption scheme and increased security (best effort basis!)
  • Standardize connection error messages + communicate some errors visually to user
  • Added env var to disable rate limit
  • Updated full list of supported os environment variables in README.md

entry.title: New release for Chiyogami: 1.3.5
entry.content:
• Create paste via file upload to the API server. Ref
  • Limit QR png generation to clients sending custom header.
  • Undo code drop 2f7294af851badc2d6e6c6a9887928152b54014e. Actual bug reported upsteam.
  • Organize svg making the html code more readable.
  • Minor code clean ups.

entry.title: New release for Chiyogami: v1.3.7
entry.content:
• Code snippets should be properly recognized by highlightjs for popular languages
  • Rate limit is now configurable
  • Updated go dependencies

entry.title: New release for Chiyogami: v1.3.8
entry.content: Minor usability improvements: - Add title in confirm delete prompt for user pastes - Space out layout in CREATED menu for confident input on touch devices - Bug fix: Do not show expired titles in CREATED menu

entry.title: New release for Chiyogami: v1.3.9
entry.content:
• Improve error handling on frontend
  • Rate limit revamp
  • Update Marked
